alert.note: Alert for Beaufort (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Beaufort County through 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over River Road, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Washington, River Road, Cox Crossroads, Core Point, Bunyan, Goose Creek State Park and Washington Park. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
